chat.win: I told you that bugs are awesome!

chat.opening: Have you seen a Butterfree? I love those.
chat.win: I think I see one. Thanks for the battle.
chat.lose: Oh well. If you see one, let me know.

chat.opening: Bugs are so beautiful. I would like to see you try to take down my team!
chat.win: See the beauty of my bugs.
chat.lose: You may have beaten me but it was my bugs that really shined.

chat.opening: Can we battle? I need my bug Pokémon to be stronger.
chat.win: It looks like my Pokémon are stronger than I thought.
chat.lose: I should have known my Pokémon were too weak.

chat.opening: Through much patience have I trained my team... Let's battle!
chat.win: Looks like my training paid off.
chat.lose: How could I lose after all that training?

chat.opening: Battling is a serious affair. Let's have a fun match!
chat.win: That was fun. Let's battle again sometime.
chat.lose: That was fun. Thanks for the battle.

chat.opening: If I win, you have to give me your bug Pokémon!

chat.lose: Why are bug Pokémon so rubbish?

chat.opening: There are no good bug Pokémon! If I lose, I am starting a new team!
chat.win: I don't need a new team! This one is awesome!
